DaemonPermission - Class in org.apache.commons.daemon
This class represents the permissions to control and query the status of a Daemon.

DaemonUserSignal - Interface in org.apache.commons.daemon
This interface tags a Daemon as supporting some kind of signaling method that allows the java application to perform a custom action.
DaemonWrapper - Class in org.apache.commons.daemon.support
